summary: TRAVELING APPROXIMATELY 65 MPH IN THE FAR LEFT LANE OF A MAJOR HIGHWAY.  GOING UP A SLIGHT INCLINE I TRIED TO ACCELERATE BUT THE CAR WAS NOT REACTING THEN THE RPMS WOULD SHOOT UP BUT THE CAR WOULD NOT REACT.  I HAD TO CROSS 3 LANES OF TRAFFIC TO GET TO THE EMERGENCY LANE.  THE CAR WOULD NOT GO OVER 20 MPH AFTER THAT AND STRUGGLED AT THAT.  I MANAGED TO GET TO A GAS STATION.  1 TOW TRUCK, 1 RENTAL CAR AND NOW $1500 TO REPLACE THE "WAVE PLATES" AND "WAVE HOUSING".    ADDITIONAL NOTE - THE CAR BROKE DOWN IN AUGUST 2012 AS WELL.  IN THAT INCIDENT THE WATER PUMP HAD TO BE REPLACED.  *TR
